description: Validate the implementation of thread-safe delegates in the execution engine by running the generated tests.
instructions: Navigate to the root directory of the AIWhisperer project.
Execute the test suite specifically for execution engine delegates using a command like `pytest tests/execution_engine/test_delegates.py`.
Monitor the output of the test execution.
Confirm that the test runner reports that all tests within `tests/execution_engine/test_delegates.py` passed successfully.
If any tests fail, analyze the failure output to identify the issue with the delegate implementation or thread safety and report the findings.
constraints: The validation must be performed using the pytest framework.
The test execution must target only the specified test file.
No changes should be made to the test file itself during this subtask.
validation_criteria: The command to run the tests executes without errors.
The pytest output explicitly states that all tests in `tests/execution_engine/test_delegates.py` passed.
No test failures are reported for `tests/execution_engine/test_delegates.py`.
name: validate_execution_engine_delegates
